titles.title: To provide market loss assistance during fiscal year 2001 to owners and producers on farms who are eligible for a final payment for fiscal year 2001 under production flexibility contracts entered into under the Agricultural Market Transition Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Farm Commodities and Risk Management.

committee.subcommittee: General Farm Commodities and Risk Management
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 4/3/2001--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to make market loss assistance payments to farm owners and operators eligible for final FY 2001 production flexibility contract payments.
